trans-unit.source: An error occurred while accessing the selected account '{0}' and tenant '{1}'. Select 'Link account' and refresh the account, or select a different account. Error '{2}'
trans-unit.target: 访问所选帐户“{0}”和租户“{1}“时出错。请选择“链接帐户”并刷新帐户，或选择其他帐户。错误“{2}”

trans-unit.source: The access token for selected account '{0}' and tenant '{1}' is no longer valid. Select 'Link account' and refresh the account, or select a different account.
trans-unit.target: 所选帐户“{0}”和租户“{1}”的访问令牌不再有效。请单击“链接账户”，并刷新帐户或选择其他帐户。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel this migration?
trans-unit.target: 是否确实要取消此迁移?

trans-unit.source: Select the databases that you want to migrate to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 选择要迁移到 Azure SQL 的数据库。
(适用于 {0} 个已评估的数据库)

trans-unit.source: The assessment of your SQL Server instance '{0}' failed.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 实例“{0}”的评估失败。

trans-unit.source:
We are assessing the databases in your SQL Server instance {0} to identify the right Azure SQL target.
This may take some time.
trans-unit.target:
我们正在评估 SQL Server 实例 {0} 中的数据库，以识别正确的 Azure SQL 目标。
这可能需要一些时间才能完成。

trans-unit.source: Databases that are not ready for migration to Azure SQL Managed Instance or Azure SQL Database can be migrated to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: 可将尚未准备好迁移到 Azure SQL 托管实例或 Azure SQL 数据库的数据库迁移到 Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server。

trans-unit.source: Databases that are not ready for migration to Azure SQL Database can be migrated to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines. Alternatively, review assessment results for Azure SQL Managed Instance migration readiness.
trans-unit.target: 可将尚未准备好迁移到 Azure SQL 数据库的数据库迁移到 Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server。或查看 Azure SQL 托管实例迁移就绪情况的评估结果。

trans-unit.source: Databases that are not ready for migration to Azure SQL Managed Instance can be migrated to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines. Alternatively, review assessment results for Azure SQL Database migration readiness.
trans-unit.target: 可将尚未准备好迁移到 Azure SQL 托管实例的数据库迁移到 Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server。或查看 Azure SQL 数据库迁移就绪情况的评估结果。

trans-unit.source: This is a blocking issue that will prevent the database migration from succeeding.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个阻止性问题，将阻止数据库迁移成功。
Azure SQL 数据库服务器

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines
trans-unit.target: Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server
Azure VM 上的 SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Azure Storage account to upload backups
trans-unit.target: 要上传备份的 Azure 存储帐户

trans-unit.source: A SQL Managed Instance migration cutover to the Business Critical service tier can take significantly longer than General Purpose because three secondary replicas have to be seeded for Always On High Availability group. The duration of the operation depends on the size of the data. Seeding speed in 90% of cases is 220 GB/hour or higher.
trans-unit.target: SQL 托管实例迁移直接转换到业务关键服务层需要的时间可能远多于常规用途，因为必须为始终打开高可用性组设置三个次要副本的种子。该操作持续时间取决于数据的大小。在 90% 的情况下，设置种子的速度为 220 GB/小时或更高。

trans-unit.source: Select a blob container value first.
trans-unit.target: 首先选择一个 Blob 容器值。

trans-unit.source: Select a resource group value first.

trans-unit.target: Azure 存储 Blob 容器详细信息

trans-unit.source: Provide the Azure Storage Blob Container that contains the backups.
trans-unit.target: 提供包含备份的 Azure 存储 Blob 容器。

trans-unit.source: Enter target database name and select resource group, storage account and container for the selected source databases.
trans-unit.target: 输入目标数据库名称，并为所选源数据库选择资源组、存储帐户和容器。

trans-unit.source: Select a storage account value first.
{0}/{1} databases can be migrated without issues
trans-unit.target: 可迁移 {0} 个数据库(共 {1} 个)，而不会出现问题

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while canceling the migration.
Migration is not in progress and cannot be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 迁移未进行，并且无法取消。

trans-unit.source: Migration is not in progress and cannot be cutover.
trans-unit.target: 迁移未进行，无法直接转换。

trans-unit.source: The cutover process cannot start until all the migrations are done. To return the latest file status, refresh your browser window.
trans-unit.target: 在完成所有迁移之前，无法启动直接转换进程。要返回最新文件状态，请刷新浏览器窗口。

trans-unit.source: Completing cutover without restoring all the backups may result in a data loss.
trans-unit.target: 在不还原所有备份的情况下完成直接转换可能导致数据丢失。

trans-unit.source: I confirm there are no additional log backups to provide and want to complete cutover.
trans-unit.target: 我确认没有要提供的其他日志备份，并且希望完成直接转换。

trans-unit.source: Data movement throughput achieved during the migration of your database backups to Azure. This is the rate of data transfer, calculated by data read divided by duration of backups migration to Azure.
trans-unit.target: 将数据库备份迁移到 Azure 期间实现的数据移动吞吐量。这是数据传输速率，计算方式为读取的数据除以备份迁移到 Azure 的持续时间。
数据库迁移完成直接转换

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while initiating cutover.
Perform the following steps before you complete cutover.
trans-unit.target: 在完成直接转换之前，请执行以下步骤。
正在对数据库“{0}”进行直接转换

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while refreshing the migration status.
1. Stop all incoming transactions to the source database.
trans-unit.target: 1. 停止到源数据库的所有传入事务。

trans-unit.source: 2. Create a final transaction log differential or backup and store it in the Azure Storage Blob Container.
trans-unit.target: 2. 创建最终事务日志的差异或备份，并将其存储在 Azure 存储 Blob 容器中。

trans-unit.source: 2. Create a final transaction log backup and store it on the network share.
trans-unit.target: 2. 创建最终事务日志备份并将其存储在网络共享上。

trans-unit.source: 3. Verify that all backups have been restored on the target database. The "Log backups pending restore" value should be zero.
trans-unit.target: 3. 验证是否已在目标数据库上还原所有备份。“等待还原的日志备份”值应为零。

trans-unit.source: 3. Verify that all log backups have been restored on the target database. The "Log backups pending restore" value should be zero.
trans-unit.target: 3. 验证是否已在目标数据库上还原所有日志备份。“等待还原的日志备份”值应为零。

trans-unit.source: Determine the migration readiness of your SQL Server instances, identify a recommended Azure SQL target, and complete the migration of your SQL Server instance to Azure SQL Managed Instance, SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines or Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: 确定 SQL Server 实例的迁移准备情况，确定建议的 Azure SQL 目标，并完成 SQL Server 实例向 Azure SQL 托管实例、Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server 或 Azure SQL 数据库的迁移。

trans-unit.source: A hub of migration articles that provides step-by-step guidance for migrating and modernizing your data assets in Azure.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关在 Azure 中迁移和现代化数据资产分步指南的迁移文章中心。

trans-unit.source: A step-by-step tutorial to migrate databases from a SQL Server instance (on-premises or Azure Virtual Machines) to Azure SQL Managed Instance with minimal downtime.
trans-unit.target: 以最短故障时间将数据库从 SQL Server 实例(本地或 Azure 虚拟机)迁移到 Azure SQL 托管实例的分步教程。

trans-unit.source: The Azure SQL Migration extension for Azure Data Studio provides capabilities to assess, get right-sized Azure recommendations and migrate SQL Server databases to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Studio 的 Azure SQL 迁移扩展提供评估、获取适当大小的 Azure 建议以及将 SQL Server 数据库迁移到 Azure 的功能。

trans-unit.source: A step-by-step tutorial to migrate databases from a SQL Server instance (on-premises or Azure Virtual Machines) to Azure SQL Database (PREVIEW).
trans-unit.target: 将数据库从 SQL Server 实例(本地或 Azure 虚拟机中)迁移到 Azure SQL 数据库(预览)的分步教程。

trans-unit.source: A step-by-step tutorial to migrate databases from a SQL Server instance (on-premises) to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines with minimal downtime.
trans-unit.target: 以最短故障时间将数据库从 SQL Server 实例(本地)迁移到 Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server 的分步教程。

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Migrate to Azure SQL Managed Instance (online)
trans-unit.target: 教程: 迁移到 Azure SQL 托管实例(联机)

trans-unit.source: Migrate databases using Azure Data Studio
trans-unit.target: 使用 Azure Data Studio 迁移数据库

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Migrate to SQL Server on Azure SQL Database (offline) - (PREVIEW)
trans-unit.target: 教程: 迁移到 Azure SQL 数据库上的 SQL Server (脱机)–(预览)

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Migrate to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines (online)
trans-unit.target: 教程: 迁移到 Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server (联机)

trans-unit.source: Migrate a SQL Server instance to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 将 SQL Server 实例迁移到 Azure SQL。

trans-unit.source: Comparison of the actual amount of data read from the source and the actual amount of data uploaded to the target.
trans-unit.target: 比较从源读取的实际数据量和上传到目标的实际数据量。

trans-unit.target: 目标托管实例“{1}”上已存在数据库“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: Select the databases that you want to assess for migration to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 选择要评估以迁移到 Azure SQL 的数据库。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while accessing database details.
trans-unit.target: 访问数据库详细信息时出错。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while connecting to target migration database.
trans-unit.target: 连接到目标迁移数据库时出错。
正在加载数据库表列表。.

trans-unit.source: To migrate to the Azure SQL target, choose a migration mode based on your downtime requirements.
trans-unit.target: 要迁移到 Azure SQL 目标，请根据停机时间要求选择迁移模式。

trans-unit.source: Application downtime will start when the migration starts.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序停机时间将在迁移启动时开始。

trans-unit.source: Application downtime is limited to cutover at the end of migration.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序停机时间限制为在迁移结束时直接转换。
数据库迁移服务身份验证密钥

trans-unit.target: 已成功创建数据库迁移服务。

trans-unit.source: Select the location of the database backups to use during migration.
trans-unit.target: 选择要在迁移期间使用的数据库备份的位置。

trans-unit.source: To migrate to the Azure SQL target, select tables in each database for migration.
trans-unit.target: 要迁移到 Azure SQL 目标，请选择每个数据库中的表以进行迁移。

trans-unit.target: 请选择要迁移到的目标数据库表。至少需要一个包含一个表的数据库。
已选择 {0} 个数据库(共 {1} 个)

trans-unit.target: Azure 数据库迁移服务的订阅名称

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid resource group.
trans-unit.target: 如果要继续，请选择有效的资源组。

用户帐户格式无效。示例: {0}

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果要继续，请选择有效的虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service orchestrates database migration activities and tracks their progress. You can select an existing Database Migration Service if you have created one previously, or create a new one below.
trans-unit.target: Azure 数据库迁移服务(DMS)协调数据库迁移活动并跟踪其进度。如果之前已经创建，则可以选择现有数据库迁移服务，或在下面创建一个新的服务。

trans-unit.source: No Database Migration Service found. Create a new one.
trans-unit.target: 找不到数据库迁移服务。请新建一个。

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Use this key to register your integration runtime
trans-unit.target: 第 2 步:使用此密钥注册集成运行时

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Click on 'Test connection' button to check the connection between Azure Database Migration Service and integration runtime
trans-unit.target: 步骤 3: 单击“测试连接”按钮，以检查 Azure 数据库迁移服务与集成运行时之间的连接

trans-unit.source: Last applied backup files taken on
trans-unit.target: 上次应用备份文件的时间

trans-unit.source: Learn more about things you need before starting a migration.
trans-unit.target: 在开始迁移之前，请了解有关所需内容的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Select the target database where you would like to migrate your source database to. You can choose a target database for only one source database.
trans-unit.target: 选择要将源数据库迁移到的目标数据库。只能为一个源数据库选择目标数据库。

trans-unit.source: Map selected source databases to target databases for migration
trans-unit.target: 将所选源数据库映射到目标数据库以进行迁移

trans-unit.target: 如果要继续，请输入有效的目标密码。

trans-unit.target: 如果要继续，请输入有效的目标用户名。

trans-unit.target: 我的数据库备份位于 Azure 存储 Blob 容器中

trans-unit.target: 我的数据库备份位于网络共享上

trans-unit.target: 提供备份将上传到其中的 Azure 存储帐户。

trans-unit.source: Provide the network share location where the backups are stored, and the user credentials used to access the share.
trans-unit.target: 提供存储备份的网络共享位置，以及用于访问共享的用户凭据。

trans-unit.source: Network share path for your database backups. The migration process will automatically retrieve valid backup files from this network share.

trans-unit.source: Network share location where the backups are stored
trans-unit.target: 存储备份的网络共享位置

trans-unit.source: Enter target database name and network share path information for the selected source databases.
trans-unit.target: 输入所选源数据库的目标数据库名称和网络共享路径信息。

trans-unit.target: 具有对网络共享位置读取权限的 Windows 用户账户。

trans-unit.target: Azure 帐户(非评估或 SKU 建议功能所需)

An error occurred while refreshing the migrations list. Please check your linked Azure connection and click refresh to try again.

trans-unit.source: An error has occured while refreshing the migrations list.
A resource group is a container that holds related resources for an Azure solution.
trans-unit.target: 资源组是保管 Azure 解决方案的相关资源的容器。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while retrying the migration.

trans-unit.target: 已成功将评估报告保存到 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Configuration saved. Performance data collection will remain running in the background. You can stop the collection when you want to.
trans-unit.target: 已保存配置。性能数据收集将保持在后台运行。你可以在需要时停止收集。
已成功将建议报告保存到 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Select your target Azure subscription and your target Azure SQL Managed Instance.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标 Azure 订阅和目标 Azure SQL 托管实例。

trans-unit.source: Select your target Azure Subscription and your target SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine for your target.
trans-unit.target: 为目标在 Azure 虚拟机上选择目标 Azure 订阅和目标 SQL Server。

trans-unit.source: Please select 1 or more databases to assess for migration
trans-unit.target: 请选择 1 个或多个要评估迁移的数据库

trans-unit.source: Click on SQL Server instance or any of the databases on the left to view its details.
trans-unit.target: 单击 SQL Server 实例或左侧的任意数据库以查看其详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Filter the migration list by Database Migration Service
trans-unit.target: 按数据库迁移服务筛选迁移列表
选择一项数据库迁移服务

trans-unit.source: Sign into Azure and select an account
trans-unit.target: 登录 Azure 并选择帐户
选择一项数据库迁移服务

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading available Azure accounts.
trans-unit.target: 加载可用的 Azure 帐户时出错。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading locations. Please check your Azure connection and try again.
trans-unit.target: 加载位置时出错。请检查 Azure 连接，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading available resource groups. Please check your Azure connection and try again.
trans-unit.target: 加载可用的资源组时出错。请检查 Azure 连接，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading available database migration services. Please check your Azure connection and try again.
trans-unit.target: 加载可用的数据库迁移服务时出错。请检查 Azure 连接，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading account subscriptions. Please check your Azure connection and try again.
trans-unit.target: 加载帐户订阅时出错。请检查 Azure 连接，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading available Azure account tenants.
trans-unit.target: 加载可用的 Azure 帐户租户时出错。
如果要继续，请选择目标。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the service account running the source SQL Server instance has read privileges on the network share.
trans-unit.target: 请确保运行源 SQL Server 实例的服务帐户对网络共享拥有读取权限。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service leverages Azure Data Factory's self-hosted integration runtime to upload backups from on-premises network file share to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Azure 数据库迁移服务利用 Azure 数据工厂的自承载集成运行时将备份从本地网络文件共享上传到 Azure。

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions below to setup self-hosted integration runtime.
trans-unit.target: 按照下面的说明安装自承载集成运行时。

trans-unit.source: Authentication keys used to connect to the self-hosted integration runtime node
trans-unit.target: 用于连接到自承载集成运行时节点的身份验证密钥
自承载集成运行时节点
Azure 数据库迁移服务“{0}”详细信息:

trans-unit.source: No Migration Services found. To continue, create a new one.
trans-unit.target: 未找到迁移服务。若要继续，请新建一个。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service is not registered. Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' needs to be registered with self-hosted integration runtime on any node.
trans-unit.target: 未注册 Azure 数据库迁移服务。Azure 数据库迁移服务“{0}”需要向任意节点上的自承载集成运行时进行注册。

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' is connected to self-hosted integration runtime running on the node - {1}
trans-unit.target: Azure 数据库迁移服务“{0}”已连接到在节点上运行的自承载集成运行时 - {1}

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while refreshing the migration service creation status.
trans-unit.target: 刷新迁移服务创建状态时出错。

trans-unit.source: Enter the information below to add a new Azure Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: 在下面输入信息以添加新的 Azure 数据库迁移服务。
创建 Azure 数据库迁移服务

trans-unit.source: Azure region for your Azure Database Migration Service. This should be the same region as your target Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 适用于 Azure 数据库迁移服务的 Azure 区域。此区域应与目标 Azure SQL 相同。
Azure 数据库迁移服务名称。

trans-unit.source: Resource group for your Azure Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: Azure 数据库迁移服务的资源组。

trans-unit.source: Subscription name for your Azure Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: Azure 数据库迁移服务的订阅名称。

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL target selected as default.
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL 目标选择为默认。
自承载集成运行时节点

trans-unit.source: Choose how you want to provide performance data
trans-unit.target: 选择希望如何提供性能数据

trans-unit.source: Select a folder on your local drive where performance data will be saved
trans-unit.target: 在将保存性能数据的本地驱动器上选择一个文件夹

trans-unit.source: Azure recommendation requires performance data of SQL server instance to provide target recommendation. Enable performance data collection to receive the target recommendation for the databases you want to migrate. The longer this will be enabled the better the recommendation. You can disable performance data collection at any time.
trans-unit.target: Azure 建议需要 SQL Server 实例的性能数据来提供目标建议。启用性能数据收集以接收要迁移的数据库的目标建议。启用此功能的时间越长，建议就越好。可以随时禁用性能数据收集。

trans-unit.source: You can also choose to select this data from an existing folder, if you have already collected it previously.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前已收集此数据，则还可以选择从现有文件夹中选择此数据。

trans-unit.source: I already have the performance data
Select a folder on your local drive where previously collected performance data was saved
trans-unit.target: 在保存以前收集的性能数据的本地驱动器上选择文件夹
正在启动性能数据收集...

trans-unit.source: Initial recommendations will automatically refresh in approximately {0} minute(s).
trans-unit.target: 初始建议将在大约 {0} 分钟后自动刷新。

trans-unit.source: Azure recommendation has been applied using the provided data. Import or collect additional data to refine the recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 已使用提供的数据应用 Azure 建议。导入或收集其他数据以优化建议。

trans-unit.source: Data collection in progress. Generating initial recommendations...
trans-unit.target: 正在收集数据。正在生成初始建议...

trans-unit.source: Check back periodically for updated recommendations by pressing the 'Refresh recommendation' button.
trans-unit.target: 通过按“刷新建议”按钮来定期返回查看更新的建议。

trans-unit.source: Azure recommendation collects and analyzes performance data and then recommends an appropriate sized target in Azure for your workload.
trans-unit.target: Azure 建议收集和分析性能数据，然后在 Azure 中为工作负载推荐适当大小的目标。

trans-unit.source: Data collection still in progress. Refining existing recommendations...
trans-unit.target: 数据收集仍在进行。正在优化现有建议...

trans-unit.source: Data collection for Azure recommendations has been stopped.
trans-unit.target: 已停止 Azure 建议的数据收集。
正在停止性能数据收集...

trans-unit.source: Running the performance collection for a longer period of time helps ensure a more accurate recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 长时间运行性能集合有助于确保更准确的建议。

trans-unit.source: Click the button below to import or collect database performance data.
trans-unit.target: 单击下面的按钮以导入或收集数据库性能数据。

trans-unit.source: Azure recommendation will be displayed once data collection is complete.
trans-unit.target: 数据收集完成后，将显示 Azure 建议。

trans-unit.source: Azure recommendation is not available. Click “Get Azure recommendation” button below
trans-unit.target: Azure 建议不可用。单击下面的“获取 Azure 建议”按钮

trans-unit.source: Azure region for your Azure SQL target. Only regions that contain a target eligible for migration will be shown.
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL 目标的 Azure 区域。将仅显示包含符合迁移条件的目标的区域。

trans-unit.source: Elastic recommendation uses an alternate recommendation model which utilizes personalized price-performance profiling against existing on-cloud customers.
trans-unit.target: 弹性建议使用替代建议模型，该模型针对现有的云客户使用个性化的性价比分析。

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option will include the latest hardware generations that have significantly improved performance and scalability. These SKUs are currently in Preview and may not yet be available in all regions.
trans-unit.target: 启用此选项将包括性能和可伸缩性显著提高的最新硬件代系。这些 SKU 目前处于预览状态，并且可能尚未在所有区域中提供。

trans-unit.source: Percentile of data points to be used during aggregation of the performance data.
trans-unit.target: 在聚合性能数据期间要使用的数据点的百分位数。

trans-unit.source: Invalid scale factor. Enter a positive integer value.
trans-unit.target: 比例因子无效。请输入正整数值。

trans-unit.source: Change scale factor if you want the Azure recommendation to be a percentage larger or smaller than you current workload.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望 Azure 建议的百分比大于或小于当前工作负载，请更改比例因子。

trans-unit.source: Enter the information below to edit the recommendation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 输入以下信息以编辑建议参数。

trans-unit.source: To migrate to Azure SQL Managed Instance, view assessment results and select one or more databases.
trans-unit.target: 若要迁移到 Azure SQL 托管实例，请查看评估结果并选择一个或多个数据库。

trans-unit.source: To migrate to Azure SQL Database (PREVIEW), view assessment results and select one or more databases.
trans-unit.target: 要迁移到 Azure SQL 数据库(预览)，请查看评估结果并选择一个或多个数据库。

trans-unit.source: To migrate to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine, view assessment results and select one or more databases.
trans-unit.target: 若要迁移到 Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server，请查看评估结果并选择一个或多个数据库。

trans-unit.source: Your Azure SQL target resource name
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL 目标资源名称

trans-unit.source: Resource group for your Azure SQL target. Only resource groups that contain a target eligible for migration will be shown.
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL 目标的资源组。将仅显示包含符合迁移条件的目标的资源组。

trans-unit.source: Subscription name for your Azure SQL target
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL 目标的订阅名称

trans-unit.source: Place tempdb on the local ephemeral SSD (default D:\) drive
trans-unit.target: 将 tempdb 置于本地临时 SSD (默认为 D: \)驱动器上

trans-unit.source: Below is the target storage configuration required to meet your storage performance needs.
trans-unit.target: 下面是满足存储性能需求所需的目标存储配置。

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Enter the SQL Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server instance {0}. These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identify valid backup files.
trans-unit.target: 输入用于连接到 SQL Server 实例 {0} 的 SQL 身份验证凭据。这些凭据将用于连接到 SQL Server 实例并标识有效的备份文件。

trans-unit.source: Enter the Windows Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server instance {0}. These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identify valid backup files.
trans-unit.target: 输入用于连接到 SQL Server 实例 {0} 的 Windows 身份验证凭据。这些凭据将用于连接到 SQL Server 实例并标识有效的备份文件。

trans-unit.source: The SQL database server '{0}' is unavailable for migration because it is currently in the '{1}' state. To continue, select an available SQL database server.
trans-unit.target: SQL 数据库服务器“{0}”不可用于迁移，因为它当前处于“{1}”状态。如果要继续，请选择可用的 SQL 数据库服务器。

trans-unit.source: Add your Azure account to view existing migrations and their status.
trans-unit.target: 添加 Azure 帐户以查看现有迁移及其状态。
已准备好进行直接转换

trans-unit.source: Select a Database Migration Service to monitor migrations.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项数据库迁移服务来监视迁移。

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Azure 虚拟机上的 SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Missing target tables excluded from list: {0}
trans-unit.target: 缺少的目标表已从列表中排除: {0}
已选择 {0} 个表(共 {1} 个)

trans-unit.source: Select a unique name for this target database
trans-unit.target: 为此目标数据库选择唯一名称

trans-unit.source: Select an Azure account linked to Azure Data Studio, or link one now.
trans-unit.target: 选择链接到 Azure Data Studio 的 Azure 账户，或立即链接一个账户。

trans-unit.source: Add a linked account and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 请添加链接帐户，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while conneting to the target server.
trans-unit.target: 连接到目标服务器时出错。

trans-unit.source:
Error(s) occurred while collecting performance data for the server '{0}'. If these issues persist, try restarting the data collection process:
{1}
trans-unit.target:
收集服务器“{0}”的性能数据时出错。如果这些问题仍然存在，请尝试重启数据收集过程:
{1}

trans-unit.source: Based on the assessment results, all {0} of your databases in an online state can be migrated to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: 根据评估结果，你的联机状态下的所有 {0} 个数据库都可以迁移到 Azure SQL。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while assessing the server '{0}'.
Check this option to skip assessment and continue the migration.
trans-unit.target: 选中此选项可跳过评估并继续迁移。

trans-unit.source: [There are no assessment results to validate readiness of your database migration. By checking this box, you acknowledge you want to proceed migrating your database to the desired Azure SQL target.]
trans-unit.target: [没有评估结果来验证数据库迁移的准备情况。选中此框即表示你确认要继续将数据库迁移到所需的 Azure SQL 目标。]

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error occurred while assessing the server '{0}'.{3}Message: {1}{3}stack: {2}
trans-unit.target: 评估服务器“{0}”时发生意外错误。{3}消息: {1}{3}堆栈: {2}
选择 Azure SQL 目标

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while generating SKU recommendations for the server '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 为服务器“{0}”生成 SKU 建议时出错。

trans-unit.source: No SKU recommendations were generated, as there were no SKUs which could satisfy the performance characteristics of your source. Try selecting a different target platform, adjusting recommendation parameters, selecting a different set of databases to assess, or changing the recommendation model.
trans-unit.target: 未生成 SKU 建议，因为没有可以满足源性能特征的 SKU。尝试选择其他目标平台、调整建议参数，选择一组不同的数据库来进行评估或改变建议模型。

trans-unit.source: Connection was successful but did not find any target databases.
trans-unit.target: 连接成功，但未找到任何目标数据库。

trans-unit.source: Connection was successful. Target databases found: {0}
trans-unit.target: 连接成功。已找到目标数据库: {0}

trans-unit.source: Select an Azure account and your target {0}.
trans-unit.target: 选择 Azure 帐户和目标 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Database mapping error. Target database '{0}' cannot be selected to as a migration target for database '{1}'. Target database '${targetDatabaseName}' is already selected as a migration target for database '{2}'. Please select a different target database.
trans-unit.target: 数据库映射错误。无法将目标数据库“{0}”选为数据库“{1}”的迁移目标。已将目标数据库“${targetDatabaseName}”选为数据库“{2}”的迁移目标。请选择其他目标数据库。

trans-unit.source: Database mapping error. Missing target databases to migrate. Please configure the target server connection and click connect to collect the list of available database migration targets.
trans-unit.target: 数据库映射错误。缺少要迁移的目标数据库。请配置目标服务器连接，然后单击“连接”以收集可用数据库迁移目标的列表。

trans-unit.source: Database mapping error. Source database '{0}' is not mapped to a target database. Please select a target database to migrate to.
trans-unit.target: 数据库映射错误。未将源数据库“{0}”映射到目标数据库。请选择要迁移到的目标数据库。
已选择 {0} 个数据库(共 {1} 个)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while starting the migration: '{0}'

trans-unit.target: 正在开始将数据库 {0} 迁移到 {1} - {2}
打开 Azure SQL 迁移笔记本
数据库迁移服务详细信息
Azure SQL 目标详细信息
